Vigilance
This creature gets +1/+0 as long as you control a Desert.
This creature gets +1/+0 as long as you control an artifact.

Double strike
When this creature enters, create a Junk token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

During your turn, this creature has first strike.
When this creature enters, you gain 2 life and scry 1.
{3}, {T}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {2} less to activate if you control two or more Deserts.

As long as you control two or more artifacts, this creature has flying.
Retrofit {3}{W} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It’s a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]

{2}, Sacrifice this creature: Choose one—
• This creature deals 3 damage to target battle.
• Destroy target artifact.
When this creature enters or dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

When this artifact enters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter and a flying counter on it.
Whenever a Soldier or Army you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Whenever this creature enters, exile another target creature until this creature leaves the battlefield.
Desertcycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Desert card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap it.

[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 black Army creature token if you don’t control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on an Army you control.)[/i]
When this battle enters, it deals 4 damage to up to one target tapped creature.

When this artifact enters, target nonland permanent you don’t control phases out until this artifact leaves the battlefield.
Retrofit {5}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It’s a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]

Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Creature tokens you control gain first strike until end of turn.

When this creature enters, exile the top card of your library.
{T}: You may play the exiled card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

Flying
Whenever this creature attacks, if two or more cards left your library this turn, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Scry 1.

When this creature enters, scry 3, then discover 4. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
Desertcycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Desert card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]

Draw a card. If you’ve cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand this turn, draw two cards instead.
Flashback {4}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Vigilance
As long as you’ve cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand this turn, this creature gets +2/+0.

When this creature enters, if you cast it, choose one—
• Draw a card, then discard a card.
• Exile target artifact you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.

When this artifact enters, create a 2/2 colorless Cyborg artifact creature token.

Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. You may pay {5}. If you do, discover 3. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]

Choose one—
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Create a Junk token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

When this artifact enters, scry 1, then draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may sacrifice this artifact. If you do, scry 1, then draw a card.

[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 black Army creature token if you don’t control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on an Army you control.)[/i]
When this battle enters, tap target creature an opponent controls and put three stun counters on it.  [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
The owner of target creature or creature spell puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and draw a card.

Menace
Whenever the second card leaves your library each turn, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Lifelink
Whenever this creature enters or dies, it deals 1 damage to target player or battle.

Menace

Whenever you attack with one or more Soldiers and/or Armies, each opponent loses 1 life.
When this creature enters, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and create a Treasure token.

When this artifact enters, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

Target player discards two cards. You may sacrifice an artifact or creature. If you do, you draw a card.

This spell costs {2} less to cast if you’ve sacrificed a permanent this turn.

You don’t lose the game for having 0 or less life.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have less than 1 life, you draw cards equal to the difference. Then if you have seven or more cards in hand, you lose the game.

Creatures you control with awakening counters on them have base power and toughness 4/4.
Creatures you don’t control with awakening counters on them have base power and toughness 1/1.

You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands from the top of your library.
